channel.title: IRC Page Issues
channel.description:
Hi guys, not sure if anyone has reported this but this occurs when I visit [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/irc/?autoconnect=1&channel=moparscape&nick=Lothy]https://www.moparisthebest.com/irc/?autoconnect=1&channel=moparscape&nick=Lothy[/url]:
[font=Tahoma]An error occurred.[size=medium]Sorry, the page you are looking for is currently unavailable. Please try again later.[/size] [size=medium]If you are the system administrator of this resource then you should check the[url=http://nginx.org/r/error_log]error log[/url] for details.[/size] [size=medium][i]Faithfully yours, nginx.[/i][/size] [size=medium][/size][/font]
[font=Tahoma][size=medium][/size][/font]

item.title: IRC Page Issues

@moparisthebest wrote:

This should have been fixed quite awhile ago, just didn’t see this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Page Issues
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I use mibbit when I don’t have an IRC client installed (which I don’t at the moment because I rarely use it).

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Page Issues
item.dc:creator: @hydreigon hydreigon_
item.description:
@hydreigon wrote:

if you really want to use kiwiirc just go to https://kiwiirc.com/client and enter the server irc.moparisthebest.com

i’m going to assume that you already knew this but it’s always there for those who didn’t

Read full topic

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Hi guys, not sure if anyone has reported this but this occurs when I visit https://www.moparisthebest.com/irc/?autoconnect=1&channel=moparscape&nick=Lothy:
